name: Bunker Theory
description:
~ When you wake up in an unfamiliar environment and meet the other unfortunate souls gathered with you, who can you trust? ~

Bunker Theory is a pseudo-horror visual novel where you can explore multiple scenarios and endings based on your choices. 

You find yourself in a room with a strange duffle bag with your name on it. But there's no need to worry, you're not alone! With eight other people around, finding a way out should be no problem, right? Besides, there's no reason to suspect these perfectly normal strangers...

Get to know your new friends and team up with eligible ladies to find your way out of this strange building.

* 4 Complete Routes + Epilogue for 5+ hours of gameplay!

* 15 CGs!

* 38 original music tracks!

Advisory: Blood and occasional strong language

Main Credits : (full credits can be found in game!)

Sprites by: Aster_Atheris
Story by: mizura
Background art by: yunka_art (@yunk.a_) & artisticanist (@juice.boxz)
Music by: Turlough McHugh, Will O Wisp Productions, jijigri, davidguapindaia, hstick & ymk532
